name: No More Enclosures
author: Eric Teubert

sections.description:
WordPress automatically discovers enclosures you reference in a post. Use this plugin to stop WordPress from doing that.

All other enclosures will work. Existing enclosures will not be deleted.

Quick Start

Activate the plugin.
Enjoy ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
1. Upload the no-more-enclosures directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. There is no step 3
sections.faq:
Can I help to add a feature?

That would be awesome!

Visit https://github.com/eteubert/no-more-enclosures, fork the project, add your feature and create a Pull Request. I’ll be happy to review and add your changes.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Add missing link to WordPress plugin page

1.0

  • Release
